params._gameId: The index of the game in the games array for lookup
The ID number/Index number of the game

returns._0: The index of the game in the games array

params._gameId: The index of the game in the games array for lookup

params._address: is the public key of the game creator

newGame().details: Must be initialized resulting in two transactions for new games

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

emergencyWithdraw(uint256).notice: Returns all bets to respective users

getGameId(address).notice: Uses address of the creator of the game to retrieve the game index

getStatus(uint256).notice: Returns the progress of the game

joinGame(address).notice: Join a game already in progress

newGame().notice: Adds a new empty game to storage

setGame().notice: Set the name and initial parameters of new games
